title: Draft a Website Privacy Policy
description: An in-house counsel needs to draft a new privacy policy for the company's website to comply with regulations like GDPR and CCPA.

tasks.description: Review the website to understand all the types of personal data being collected from users (e.g., names, emails, cookies).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a data map of all personal information collected.

tasks.description: Select a privacy policy template that is compliant with relevant regulations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent chooses an appropriate starting template.

tasks.description: Customize the template to accurately describe the company's specific data collection, use, and sharing practices, and to outline user rights.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a comprehensive and accurate privacy policy.
